__e: Marsh, I think I can tell you what we wanna know.
I'm sorry, Marsh, but you'll have to go it alone.
Marsh, I know what animals mean to you, but this is nonsense.
Ms. Cato, believe me, Marsh and I will do everything possible to find your bear before the colonel and his men do.
I do know that Marsh and I agree on the ground rules for the questions.
I heard you say you didn't want Marsh and his men to come on this hunt.
You are a very nice man, Dr. Marsh Tracy.
But look, what in heaven's name does someone like you--? I mean, a man in your business. --want with Marsh Tracy?
Apparently I know Marsh Tracy a lot better than you do, because I know he'd never sanction anything like that.
